evidence.claim: MedeXOne utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure, ensuring HIPAA compliance and scalable services.
The usage of X12 EDI formats for claims processing is highlighted in their service documentation.
MedeXOne supports FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability.
Reference to EHR integration capabilities suggests strong data exchange protocols with healthcare systems.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in EDI processing and uses X12 formats indicating suitability for healthcare data exchange.
